user.description:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to use the "Make a web request" action from the [IFTTT Webhook applet]({applet_url}).

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST
- Content Type: application/json

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) on how to configure automations to handle incoming data.
user.title: Set up the Webhook Applet
